summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney to Jack Goldberger, attaching a revised first page of a 'Victim Identification and Notification' document. The revision reflects a changed plea agreement term, indicating ongoing legal negotiations in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Jack Goldberger
persons.role: Recipient of email and legal document
persons.context: Addressed in an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding a revised legal notification document related to a plea agreement.

events.title: Revision of Victim Notification Document
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney sends a revised first page of a Victim Identification and Notification document to Jack Goldberger, reflecting a changed plea agreement term.

keyFacts: A legal document titled 'Victim Identification and Notification' was being revised in June 2008.
The revision pertained to a changed term in a plea agreement.
The communication involves an Assistant U.S. Attorney and an individual named Jack Goldberger, indicating legal coordination.
